original_text: And Joshua spake unto the priests, saying, Take up the ark of the covenant, and pass over before the people. And they took up the ark of the covenant, and went before the people.
korean_text: 여호수아가 또 제사장들에게 말하여 이르되 언약궤를 메고 백성에 앞서 건너라 하매 곧 언약궤를 메고 백성에 앞서 나아가니라

sentences.original_text: And Joshua spake unto the priests
Take up the ark of the covenant
and pass over before the people
And they took up the ark of the covenant
